SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Article
Represents an article in the system.
ArticleProcessor
Processes articles of different types using the Visitor design pattern.
ArticleSource
Represents the source of an article, containing a unique id and name.
ArticleVisitor
The ArticleVisitor interface defines the visitor pattern for processing articles of different types.
Driver
 
JsonParser
Abstract class representing a generic JSON parser.
JsonParserVisitor
The JsonParserVisitor class implements the JsonVisitor interface and provides the logic for visiting and processing JSON data for different types of parsers (e.g., NewsApiJsonParser, SimpleJsonParser).
JsonParserVisitorTest
 
JsonVisitor
The JsonVisitor interface defines the visitor pattern for parsing JSON data from different JSON parser types (e.g., NewsApiJsonParser, SimpleJsonParser).
NewsApiArticle
Represents an article from the News API.
NewsApiJsonParser
A parser for extracting valid articles from the News API response in various formats.
NewsApiJsonParserTest
 
NewsApiResponse
Represents a response from the News API containing a status and a list of articles.
ParserConfig
Represents the configuration for a parser, including the source of the data, the format of the data, and the input data itself.
ParserFormat
Enum representing the format of the data for the parser.
ParserSource
Enum representing the source of the data for the parser.
SimpleJsonArticle
Represents a simple JSON article with a title, description, published date, and URL.
SimpleJsonParser
Parses JSON data in the Simple JSON format into a valid SimpleJsonArticle object.
SimpleJsonParserTest
